title: Lost Medic-Nin
description: Locate and retrieve a missing medic-nin who disappeared during a supply run.
previous_context: Ren recently survived a bandit ambush.

title: Shrine Investigation
description: Investigate reports of forbidden jutsu activity in the ruins.
previous_context: A strange black feather was found near the shrine's door.

title: Supply Escort
description: Escort a convoy delivering supplies to a remote medical camp.
previous_context: Heavy fog has made the route especially dangerous.
